subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C.C. Sabathia could be a Yankee very soon after the team's general manager, Brian Cashman, canceled a meeting in Las Vegas to fly to visit the free-agent pitcher in California.
snippet: C.C. Sabathia could be a Yankee very soon after the team's general manager, Brian Cashman, canceled a meeting in Las Vegas to fly to visit the free-agent pitcher in California.
